channel.title: Chennai on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Chennai on Home

item.title: Historical coincidences
item.description: Two cities that I have lived and loved the most have been Chennai in India and Santa Barbara in the US. I was born in Chennai and brought up in its suburbs, Chennai was where I had my first job. Santa Barbara was the city I moved to from Chennai. Image: Chennai Central Railway Station Image Courtesy: Jamal Haider Image: Marina Beach, Chennai - the second longest beach in the world Image Courtesy: Wikipedia
